Author: tmfp
Title: âœ…[ANN][Pre-ICO Started]Mavro - the first decentralized platform for MLM systemsâœ…
Body: So, reluctantly dragged back to this toxic place by someone tempted by this absurd proposal, let's see what we have....  A thread started by an account bought specifically for that purpose. Always a good sign..... #not really  And, in the "whitepaper" a picture of our old friend Sergey Panteleevich.  I see they've decided to use an old, old photo of the great Magic Money Man, from his younger revolutionary/anarcho capitalist/sociopath/socialist/Liberator and Saviour of the Oppressed incarnation.   (This collage is a recent one, referring to his old, worn out gifting scam called MMM, in its Nigerian iteration. Last time I bothered to look, it had been "reset" three times. "Reset" in this context means all money stolen, with a sort of promise that if you send some more, you might get some back. Happens to all MMM schemes. Involves huge losses for unsophisticated "investors" who have "provided help" out of a mixture of desperation and greed. A real Man of the People.)  Despite citing a Twitter account as "proof" that Mavrodi is behind this scheme, the truth is more like he is dead, stabbed with an ice pick (or was that some other Russian Hero of the People?). The last time I saw him "live", was a series of You Tube vids, mainly with his head circled by his arms, reassuring South African MMMers that "all is well". Very shortly after the videos stopped, so did the scheme. (See Nigeria for result.)    "Mavros" are nothing new by the way, MMM used them as back office tokens in order to destroy value at will.  And there's always this    Who else is part of this future of MLM, who is masterminding the Financial Future of the World?  Victor Geld....    "Creator", "Ideologist", "Co-Founder".......  or Alex, Estate Agent/Translator for hire?    and some "Russian financial adviser" called Stepan Demura. Whatever.  So, the future of currency is in the hands of these three illustrious gentlemen.   I see a few of the newbies (the few that aren't posting for rewards) are asking: what is this MLM which mavros will revolutionize?  MLM (Multi Level Marketing) is an American invention from the early 20th C. Because distances were so large and communications basic (no mobiles, no internet OMG) it was a way for a producer to expand its sales force and stockholders cheaply countrywide, with distributors recruited locally and rewards made on a pyramid basis. A hardworking "downline" was a valuable income for those near the top, and so it remains today. But time has caught up with MLM, it only exists legitimately now because of the huge inertia and legal and lobbying power of the big players like Amway, Avon, Tupperware etc. etc. and the desperation that drives most of their lower level participants to work for little reward. It's a shit, outmoded business model in the Age of Amazon, still here only because of corporate lobbying and the large rewards for the >1% at the top of the pyramid.  Like most systems with vested interest, MLM has mutated to survive and received some new energy in the context of recruiting victims for Ponzi Schemes. (Ponzi Schemes are simply fraudulent business models which only survive by using later "investors" funds to meet promised impossible returns on investment which have been made to early investors.) Tied to lucrative multi level recruitment schemes, they appear from nowhere, suck in investment and disappear. Organized Criminals or Freedom Fighters? Crypto is riddled with them (think mining, options trading etc.) also with noisy shills promoting them, excusing their lies with a "personal responsibility" mantra.  So which of the two types of MLM will make use of this 'mavro transparency' supposedly on offer here? Neither. Pseudo legitimate giants like Amway? No, if they wanted to they could easily employ their own blockchain, but they won't. In an industry which thrives on immense inequality of earnings and opportunity, the last thing they want is transparency. Ponzi schemes? Of course not. It would kill them.  Roadmap....  The first four stages successfully completed then. And what exactly has been achieved so far? You will see under Stage 2, 30% per month 'dividends' were paid. There was no economic activity creating wealth, just a Xerox machine (90's terminology). It was shut down, according to MMM orthodox propaganda, as a "threat to the state". In the 110 countries referred to in Stage 3, it was also shut down. So many states threatened......or just straight forward theft thru a simple Ponzi structure that devalued itself by design? Stage 10.... 2020, "revolution in the worldwide economy". I'm all for that, the sooner the better, but when Sergey says "Financial Apocalypse is Inevitable" (and has been saying for 25 years) he's referring to the personal financial apocalypse that comes from giving him money.  What has been will be.
